protocols.name: Multicast UDP
protocols.description: Efficient communication protocol for decentralized systems

algorithms.name: Message Routing Algorithm
algorithms.description: Algorithm for routing messages between nodes
steps: Message forwarded through nodes based on distance and load

ram.name: Distributed Memory Cache
ram.description: In-memory storage to handle large amounts of real-time data

protocols.name: LinkC Mesh Network
protocols.description: A decentralized, scalable, and self-healing communication protocol for IoT devices

algorithms.name: Adaptive Connection Algorithm
algorithms.description: Algorithm for adjusting network connections based on node behavior and environmental conditions
steps: Detect new nodes in the vicinity
Establish connection based on signal strength and node type
Continuously adapt connections to optimize performance

ram.name: RAM Boosting Protocol
ram.description: Protocol for optimizing RAM usage and increasing data throughput
data_storage: Run heavy computations for consensus algorithms

protocols.name: Blockchain Smart Contracts
protocols.description: A protocol for executing and managing decentralized applications (DApps)

algorithms.name: Transaction Verification Algorithm
algorithms.description: Algorithm for verifying blockchain transactions in real-time
steps: Transaction broadcast to the network for verification
Transaction included in a block after consensus is reached

ram.name: Blockchain Data Indexing
ram.description: In-memory storage for fast retrieval and indexing of blockchain data

protocols.name: Energy-Efficient Consensus
protocols.description: A consensus protocol designed to minimize energy consumption while maintaining security

algorithms.name: Proof-of-Stake (PoS)
algorithms.description: A consensus algorithm where participants 'stake' tokens to propose and validate blocks
steps: Participants lock up tokens as collateral
Validators are randomly selected to propose new blocks
Other validators vote on the block's validity

ram.name: High-Throughput Transaction Engine
ram.description: An engine that processes transactions quickly and efficiently, utilizing RAM to avoid bottlenecks
